text: Don Collier (October 17, 1928 â€“ September 13, 2021) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles in The High Chaparral, Bonanza, Gunsmoke and Outlaws as Marshal Will Foreman. Collier died at age 92 in Harrodsburg, Kentucky, from lung cancer on September 13, 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California
title: Don Collier
